resources.string: DMAC
Hello blank fragment
Open
Close
What will be the charges per month?
Do I need to upload the documents daily?
Can I do it monthly once?
What all are the other services that you provide?
Will the GSTR return filing be done by you?
Is our data secure with you?
If I want to terminate this membership at any point of time will you give back our data?
What are the softwares on which you maintain our accounts?
Shall I have to obtain NOC from our auditor?
Will you file it returns also for us?
Will you get the accounts audited for us?
Is it necessary to change the auditor?
If I decide to terminate the contract with you, will you charge anything extra for giving back our data?
Will you provide the printed books for us?
How to contact your executive?
How many times your executive will support us?
Will your executive come and collect data from our house regularly?
Whether same executive will assist regularly to us?
What are the reports that you would provide to us?
Whether any reports would come through email?
Can I share the reports to my auditor?
How many times will you share the reports with us?
In what format the reports are given? (pdf form or word or excel)
Can I pay your fees in cash to your executive?
If I forget to pay your fees in time, whether the data entered up to that date will be with you or will it be deleted?
If I don’t have data for 2 months in between shall I have to pay your monthly fees?
I have two proprietary firms, should I have to register separately for both?
I have two partnership firms, should I to register separately with you?
I have private limited company will you maintain roc books?
Will you assist with the MCA filings?
Will you support in getting way bills?
Are there any extra charges if the fees are not paid on time?
What would happen if I don’t pay the fees on time?
What are these categories given in this application? Can you elaborate on this?
Will the TDS return filing be done by you?
How do I rectify if there is a mistake in the entries you have done?
How do I send a request to get reports if I prefer to use offline reports? Are there any intervals or can I get it whenever I want?
How do I send a request to get reports if I prefer to use offline reports? Are there any intervals or can I get it whenever I want?
If I give my bank account details, are they safe with you?
Will you do bank reconciliation for us?
If the pre-dated bills are given today, will you charge it today or on the month of the bills?
Check in the fees structure explanation.
Depending on the number of vouchers you receive you can enter every day or every two days or every week or every month.
Depending on the number of vouchers you receive you can enter every day or every two days or every week or every month.
Depending on the number of vouchers you receive you can enter every day or every two days or every week or every month.
Explain the deliverables to the customer.
Yes, it GSTR return filing is done by us.
Yes, it is encrypted and secure.
We will charge the fees for that month’s entries and we will give back all the reports we have prepared under your alias.
We maintain it on two platforms Tally and QuickBooks. The customer can choose as per his convenience.
NOC is not required from your auditor.
No, but we are expanding our portfolio of services and pretty soon will be able to assist you.
No, but we are expanding our portfolio of services and pretty soon will be able to assist you.
No, it is not necessary to change the auditor.
No, nothing extra will be charged. Only the entries made until that date will be calculated and after being paid for, we will give you back your data.
Yes, with an extra cost of printing and postal charges, we will provide you the printed books.
Give us your contact details and our nearest executive will assist you.
Our executive will support you during the registration only. He will give you a full walkthrough at that time itself.
No, he will not. You have to send pictures to us through the app.
No, the same executive will not assist you regularly.
Explain the deliverables.
Yes, if opted for offline reports, the reports would come through e-mail.
Yes, you can share your reports with your auditor.
Monthly reports will be sent to you. In case you need a report as on that date, as per your email request we will send you the report as on that date.
It would be sent to you in pdf format.
No, every payment is to be done online. No cash payments are encouraged.

No, the data will be secure. If you fail to pay the fees, we would terminate your registration and you have to re-register with us. All the reports as on the previous month would be given back to the customer after the payments as on that date are done.
No, you don’t need to pay for those two months. You pay based on the entries we do monthly.
You can maintain two companies in one single account and need not maintain two accounts.
You can maintain two companies in one single account and need not maintain two accounts.
No, but we are expanding our portfolio of services and pretty soon will be able to assist you.
No, but we are expanding our portfolio of services and pretty soon will be able to assist you.
No, but we are expanding our portfolio of services and pretty soon will be able to assist you.
The registrations gets cancelled and you will have to re-register.
The registrations gets cancelled and you will have to re-register.
Explain the types of vouchers and which all bills come under what.
Yes, TDS return filing will be done by us.

You send us a mail regarding the mistake you think has happened and we will review it again. Our executives will call you and explain why we entered it that way or he will rectify it if the fault is on our side and inform you about the same.
Yes, you can send an email to us and we will give you the reports for that date.
Yes, all the details are encrypted and secure.
No, but we are expanding our portfolio of services and pretty soon will be able to assist you.
All the bills are charged as per the number of entries made in that month, even if the voucher is pre-dated or post-dated, it will be included in this month and charged accordingly.
